title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but expression builder shows old column names
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are displayed instead of the alias names.
EB: According to SCR 78193 in the tracker, the expression builder should use the alias names for the columns instead of the original names.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select a dataset.
3. Double-click on the first column name.
4. Observe that the original column name is displayed below, but the alias name should appear above as row["column1"].
